content: Those little creatures on the beach don't have much meat, so why bother eating them? I'm holding these shellfish tongs just because... they look cool!

content: I don't really like foraging on the beach. So why am I holding a pair of shellfish tongs? It's just to make the crabs run faster. I don't catch them. I just enjoy watching them scuttle away.
